text: Evaluation and Program Planning is a bimonthly peer-reviewed multidisciplinary social science journal covering program evaluation. It was established in 1974 by Jonathan A. Morell and Eugenie Walsh Flaherty. It is published by Elsevier and the editor-in-chief is Mita Marra (University of Naples Federico II). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2018 impact factor of 1.240. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Publications established in 1974 Category:English-language journals Category:Bimonthly journals Category:Elsevier academic journals Category:Multidisciplinary social science journals Category:Evaluation
title: Evaluation and Program Planning
